name: text-case-converter
title: Text Case Converter
description: Convert text files to different case formats (upper, lower, title, sentence)
content:
Overview

This application converts text files to different case formats: uppercase, lowercase, title case, or sentence case.

Features

  • Convert to uppercase (ALL CAPS)
  • Convert to lowercase (all lowercase)
  • Convert to title case (First Letter Of Each Word)
  • Convert to sentence case (First letter of each sentence)

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a new text file with the converted case format in the specified output directory.
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$(date +%s%N)"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/text_case_converter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -c upper
